mapper.sql: PUR_NUMBER, PUR_TITLE, PUR_DATE, SUP_INFO_NUM, PAY_AMOUNT, INVOICE_NUMBER, PAY_STATUS, PUR_PROGREES, DELIVERY_TIME, DELIVERY_ADDRESS, DELIVERY_MODE, OPERATOR_ID, REMARKS_INFO, COM_ID, LAST_DATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from PUR_ORDER
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PUR_ORDER (PUR_NUMBER, PUR_TITLE, PUR_DATE, SUP_INFO_NUM, PAY_AMOUNT, INVOICE_NUMBER, PAY_STATUS, PUR_PROGREES, DELIVERY_TIME, DELIVERY_ADDRESS, DELIVERY_MODE, OPERATOR_ID, REMARKS_INFO, COM_ID, LAST_DATE ) values (#{purNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{purTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{supInfoNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{purProgrees,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliveryAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remarksInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update PUR_ORDER
PUR_NUMBER = #{record.purNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PUR_TITLE = #{record.purTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PUR_DATE = #{record.purDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

LAST_DATE = #{record.lastDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update PUR_ORDER set PUR_NUMBER = #{record.purNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PUR_TITLE = #{record.purTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUR_DATE = #{record.purDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SUP_INFO_NUM = #{record.supInfoNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAY_AMOUNT = #{record.payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INVOICE_NUMBER = #{record.invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_STATUS = #{record.payStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PUR_PROGREES = #{record.purProgrees,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELIVERY_TIME = #{record.deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELIVERY_ADDRESS = #{record.deliveryAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELIVERY_MODE = #{record.deliveryMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR_ID = #{record.operatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARKS_INFO = #{record.remarksInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COM_ID = #{record.comId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_DATE = #{record.lastDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update PUR_ORDER
PUR_TITLE = #{purTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PUR_DATE = #{purDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where PUR_NUMBER = #{purNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
